label: Candle Pattern
info: Candle stick pattern.  Up/down Thrust, Selling/buying Climax, Engulfing, Evening/Morning star.

label: ABC Pattern
info: ABC pattern.  Look for momentum with MACD histogram.

label: Pivot Anchor
info: Pivot can be an anchor if the close of the data started near the pivot, moved away and come back.

label: Key Levels
info: The current price near a weekly key support and resistance level.  Look for price action, ema and volume to determine if this stock is worth looking at.
